original_text: Thus saith the Lord, In this thou shalt know that I am the Lord: behold, I will smite with the rod that is in mine hand upon the waters which are in the river, and they shall be turned to blood.
korean_text: 여호와가 이같이 이르노니 네가 이로 말미암아 나를 여호와인 줄 알리라 볼지어다 내가 내 손의 지팡이로 나일 강을 치면 그것이 피로 변하고

sentences.original_text: In this thou shalt know that I am the Lord:
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나 여호와인 줄을 이리로 알리라.

sentences.original_text: I will smite with the rod
upon the waters which are in the river,
and they shall be turned to blood.
